lead_paragraph: Her comments about H.B.C.U.s were troubling, but it’s her approach to the budget that will determine whether she’s a friend or foe.

headline.main: Review: The New York Philharmonic Plays a Piece Inspired by Night
headline.print_headline: The Goddess of Night Is Also a Muse
